## findNodeAtEndOfDoc variable

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> use `doc.lastChild` instead
> 

Finds the node at the end of the Prosemirror document.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findNodeAtEndOfDoc: (doc: import("prosemirror-model").Node<any>) => FindProsemirrorNodeResult<any>
```
